CONTACT_FORM.TITLE: For cooperation inquiries, please fill out the form below. Our representative will contact you shortly.
CONTACT_FORM.NAME: Name
CONTACT_FORM.MESSAGE: Please fill out your cooperation needs.
CONTACT_FORM.EMAIL_WARNING: Please enter a valid email address

5272.NAME: Lucky Dog
5272.TITLE: Boost Your Wins with Lucky Dog
5272.CONTENT: Lucky Dog is a charming 『2,000 ways』 slot game featuring a popular 『Combo Multiplier』, increasing your win multipliers up to 10x with consecutive matches. The unique 『Golden Symbol』 transforms into 『Wild Symbols』 when matched, creating more winning opportunities. Follow BB's Lucky Dog and run towards a path of wealth.
5272.PROMOTE2: The more consecutive matches, the higher the multiplier rewards

5200.NAME: Hoo Hey How
5200.TITLE: Non-Stop Rewards with Hoo Hey How
5200.CONTENT: Hoo Hey How is a popular Vietnamese-themed 『1,024 ways』 slot game. Featuring a simple mechanic that increases multipliers up to 10x with consecutive matches and 『Golden Symbols』 that transform into 『Wild Symbols』 when matched. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of BB's Vietnamese theme and enjoy the thrill of consecutive wins.
5200.PROMOTE1: Free games offer up to 10x consecutive win rewards
5200.PROMOTE2: Golden Symbols enhance consecutive win opportunities

5275.NAME: Mahjong Ways
5275.TITLE: Win Big with Mahjong
5275.CONTENT: Mahjong Ways is a 『1,024 ways』 slot game featuring a mahjong theme with 『Golden Plated Symbols』 that transform into 『Wild Symbols』, significantly boosting your chances of winning. The key 『Combo Multiplier』 feature increases multipliers up to 10x in the free game with consecutive wins! Join BB’s new mahjong trend and win big.
5275.PROMOTE1: Golden Plated Symbols increases consecutive win rewards
5275.PROMOTE2: Free games further upgrade reward multipliers

5252.NAME: Leprechaun
5252.TITLE: Double Your Wealth with Lucky Multipliers
5252.CONTENT: Leprechaun is a fantasy-themed slot game with 『15,625 ways』. Each Leprechaun symbol grants a 2x multiplier and can trigger unlimited multipliers in the free game, continuously boosting your winnings. Symbols within the Gold Frame transform into 『Wild Symbols』, greatly enhancing your chances to score. Enter the leprechaun’s lucky realm and experience a world where wealth multiplies endlessly.
5252.PROMOTE1: Lucky Multipliers for continuous score boosts
5252.PROMOTE2: Colossal Symbols for increased scoring opportunities

5234.NAME: Awesome Buffalo
5234.TITLE: Maximize Wins with Wilds and Multipliers
5234.CONTENT: Awesome Buffalo is a 『46,656 ways』slot game, consecutive wins with the 『Special frame』 transform into 『Wild Symbols』, creating more winning opportunities on every spin!
5234.PROMOTE1: Floating ways with up to 46,656 ways to win
5234.PROMOTE2: Special frame create more win opportunities
